original_title: John Cage Mushroom Hunting in Stony Point
overview: "Filmic impressions of composer John Cage, mushroom hunting on his home ground of Stony Point, New York; visiting his home for the last time; radiating love towards his friends; and buying fruits and vegetables at the farm market before returning to New York City." â€”Jud Yalkut
title: John Cage Mushroom Hunting in Stony Point
